sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect,useState } from 'react' import ReactFileBase64 from 'react-file-base64' import { Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import {updateMemory, fetchMemory} from '../axios/index.js' const UpdateMemory = ({id}) => { const [memoryData, setMemoryData] = useState({ title: '', content: '', creator: '', image: '', }) useEffect(()=>{ const getMemo = async () =>{ const { data } = await fetchMemory(id) setMemoryData(data) } getMemo() },[id]) const history = useHistory() return (<>
{ e.preventDefault() updateMemory(id,memoryData) history.push('/') } } >

Update the memory

 Title setMemoryData({ ...memoryData, title: e.target.value }) } value={memoryData.title} > Author setMemoryData({ ...memoryData, creator: e.target.value }) } value={memoryData.creator} > Content setMemoryData({ ...memoryData, content: e.target.value }) } value={memoryData.content} > setMemoryData({ ...memoryData, image: base64 }) } value={memoryData.creator} />
) } export default UpdateMemory
